block.p: LEAD: Maurice Evans Dies at 87 Maurice Evans, popular for his Shakespearean portrayals in the 1930's and 40's, has died, Page D27. Warning on Chilean Fruit Follows Cyanide Discovery Consumers were urged not to eat Chilean fruit after cyanide was found in Chilean grapes in Philadelphia.

LEAD: Maurice Evans Dies at 87 Maurice Evans, popular for his Shakespearean portrayals in the 1930's and 40's, has died, Page D27. Warning on Chilean Fruit Follows Cyanide Discovery Consumers were urged not to eat Chilean fruit after cyanide was found in Chilean grapes in Philadelphia.

Maurice Evans Dies at 87 Maurice Evans, popular for his Shakespearean portrayals in the 1930's and 40's, has died, Page D27. Warning on Chilean Fruit Follows Cyanide Discovery Consumers were urged not to eat Chilean fruit after cyanide was found in Chilean grapes in Philadelphia.

The Government plans to impound all fresh fruit from Chile. Page A15. Baker Meets With Israeli The Secretary of State met with the Israeli Foreign Minister and outlined an approach to peace. Page A8. Action on Global Warming The E.P.A. proposed steps to delay and reduce the expected warming of the Earth. Science Times, page C7.
